mapper.insert: INSERT INTO emotion_record (emotion_record_id, user_id, emotion_reason, emotion_record_type, emotion_record_level, emotion_record_state, diary_entry) VALUES (#{emotionRecordId}, #{userId}, #{emotionReason}, #{emotionRecordType}, #{emotionRecordLevel}, #{emotionRecordState}, #{diaryEntry})
mapper.update: UPDATE emotion_record SET emotion_reason = #{emotionReason}, emotion_record_type = #{emotionRecordType}, emotion_record_level = #{emotionRecordLevel}, emotion_record_state = #{emotionRecordState}, diary_entry = #{diaryEntry}, updated_time = now() WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND emotion_record_id = #{emotionRecordId};
